name: A Simple Ball Game
description:
Hey!

Your a ball, and your cube is on the other side of a platoform puzzle! Problem is, it was made literally by a noob at coding. Can you reach your cube, and bring it Home?

This is my first game and Im so exited to release it to yall!

Please give me any suggestions or feedback, as I want to expand this game to a full Steam release! Enjoy!
